column5: Looking to take the creek back to Clearwater in a couple of weeks. How is the water level currently? Anyone make it up the creek lately for trout?Thanks

I think a few Cedar Point Lodge boats are grinding their way up the channel, making it deeper with their props. Access in a few weeks will depend on future rain. Water levels are on the low side. A certain lodge has boats on Clearwater should you be lucky enough to stay there....
Gee, I wonder what lodge that is....
